metadata.title: CVE-2017-0414 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: An information disclosure vulnerability in AOSP Messaging could enable alocal malicious application to bypass operating system protections thatisolate application data from other applications. This issue is rated asHigh because it could be used to gain access to data that the applicationdoes not have access to. Product: Android. Versions: 6.0, 6.0.1, 7.0,7.1.1. Android ID: A-32807795.

criterions.comment: android: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
